name: nextWeekendStart(_:interval:options:after:)
desc: Returns by reference the starting date and time interval range of the next weekend period after a given date.
declaration:
func nextWeekendStart(_ datep: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<NSDate?>?, 
             interval tip: UnsafeMutablePointer<TimeInterval>?, 
              options: NSCalendar.Options = [], 
                after date: Date) -> Bool
